background: Tamer Morsi, as Chairman of United Media Services, oversees Al Hayah TV’s commissioning strategy. He focuses on factual entertainment and lifestyle programming with family appeal, high production values and national pride.
thematic_priorities: Everyday Egyptian stories with emotional resonance
History and national icons reimagined for TV
technical_requirements: Compliance with cultural and regulatory standards
submission_process: Short format proposal or sizzle reel preferred
name: Tamer Morsi
